summary.title: End-to-End Machine Learning
summary.body: Expertise in the complete ML lifecycle, from data preprocessing and feature engineering to deploying high-performance ensemble models.

summary.title: Generative AI & LLM Systems
summary.body: Skilled in building and optimizing LLMs using prompt engineering, RLHF, and LoRA/QLoRA fine-tuning for culturally-aware Arabic NLP.

summary.title: Advanced Retrieval & Vector Search
summary.body: Proficient in designing retrieval systems using dense/hybrid search and scalable vector databases like ChromaDB and Weaviate.

projects.title: Arabic PDF Chat ðŸ“šðŸ’¬
projects.description: Arabic Chat with PDF is an innovative tool designed to enable users to interactively query Arabic PDF documents. Powered by state-of-the-art language models and document processing libraries, this application extracts, processes, and retrieves meaningful insights from Arabic text documents.

projects.title: aiNarabic Hub
projects.description: Our aiNarabic Hub is the official web presence for the aiNarabic initiative. It's designed to be a central hub for the Arabic-speaking community to explore the world of Artificial Intelligence. The platform is built from the ground up using a modern, performant, and scalable tech stack. open-source.

projects.title: ATS Cover Letter Generator
projects.description: The ATS Cover Letter Generator bridges the gap between job seekers and employers by leveraging AI to create perfectly tailored, Applicant Tracking System (ATS) optimized cover letters. Using Groq's high-performance LLaMA-3.1-8B-Instant API, the application analyzes your resume and job descriptions to craft compelling cover letters that increase your chances of interview selection.

projects.title: Arabic Digits Recognition
projects.description: Arabic Digits Recognition project aims to develop a robust Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) model capable of accurately recognizing spoken Arabic digits. This project leverages a diverse dataset collected from 65 individuals of varying ages and genders, ensuring a comprehensive representation of the Arabic-speaking population.

projects.title: CodeXpert
projects.description: CodeXpert, an advanced, state-of-the-art framework designed to analyze, explain, and optimize Python codebases. This repository leverages CodeLlama, LangChain, and FAISS to deliver a seamless, interactive experience for code comprehension and improvement.

publications.title: 2024 AI Recap: A Comprehensive Year-in-Review
publications.description: An in-depth annual report analyzing key breakthroughs, emerging trends, and significant milestones in AI throughout 2024.

publications.title: Choosing the Right IT Major: A Student's Guide
publications.description: A practical guide for students on making informed decisions about their IT education, outlining career paths and required skills.
